C:\Windows\system32\wsl.exe --distribution Ubuntu --exec /bin/bash -c "export CMAKE_COLOR_DIAGNOSTICS=ON && export CLION_IDE=TRUE && export JETBRAINS_IDE=TRUE && cd /mnt/c/Users/mingy/Desktop/Study/JungleC/Clang/cmake-build-debug && /usr/bin/cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -G 'CodeBlocks - Unix Makefiles' /mnt/c/Users/mingy/Desktop/Study/JungleC/Clang"
/bin/bash: line 1: /usr/bin/cmake: No such file or directory
